{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-N12 |revision=VP |upc=886227335770 |ean=4716659335771 |asin=B00DWFPDNO |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SGE |manuf_model=AP699E5N3 |manuf_rev=.CT124-4 REV1.0 |availability=now |fcc_date=01/10/2014 |fcc_id=MSQ-RTN12D1 |pcb_id=AP699E5N3 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5357C0 |cpu1_cspeed=300 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406E |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM63A165TS-6G |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5357C0 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=FreshTomato |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ASUS |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=AC:9E:17 |oui_eth=AC:9E:17 }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N300 3-in-1 Router/AP/Range Extender}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN12_VP/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=ASUS|model=RTN12_VP}} "AP699E5N3.CT124-4" and "REV1.0" is silkscreened on the board. {{See also|ASUS RT-N12VP B1|ASUS RT-N12 series}} :This router includes two fixed 5dBi antennas. Additional specs, per '''ASUS''''s product page, follow... *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::179 cm (W) x 128 cm (D) x 28 cm (H)]] *Weight: [[Weight::275 g]] *[https://dlcdnets.asus.com/pub/ASUS/wireless/RT-N12_VP/GPL_RT_N12_VP_30043763835.zip OEM source code GPL] ===Reviews=== *[http://club.dns-shop.ru/Владимир-123/blog/Обзор-маршрутизатора-ASUS-RT-N12VP/ On '''club.dns-shop.ru'''] ==Images== File:ASUS RT-N12VP PCB top.jpg|ASUS RT-N12VP Board [[Has images::internal| ]] ==Notes== {{SCollapse | OEM tty |
